All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmountDTO
This class represents a monetary amount.
CashRegister
Cash register keeps track of the current balance in the in store cash regiser.
Controller
Creates a new instance of the controller.
DatabaseUnreachableException
This exception is thrown when the database is unreachable.
ErrorMessageHandler
This class is responsible for showing error messages to the user.
InventoryDatabaseException
This exception is thrown when an item is not found in the inventory.
ItemDTO
Represents an item with its attributes and quantity.
ItemHandlingException
This exception is thrown when an item is not found in the inventory.
ItemListHandler
This class has custom util methods for handling lists of ItemDTO objects.
ItemNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when an item is not found in the inventory.
ItemRegister
The ItemRegister class manages a list of items.
Main
The main class that initialices the Retail Store application.
OperationFailedException
This exception is thrown when the database is unreachable.
Payment
The Payment class is responsible for handling paymen.
Period
The Period class holds the time period of a sale.
RecieptPrinter
This class is responsible for printing the receipt of a sale.
RegistryHandler
This class is a central point for managing the other database relatedregisters.
Sale
This class represents a sale.
SaleDTO
This class represents the data transfer object (DTO) for a sale.
View
The View displays information to the user and interacts with the Controller.
